author: irishmirror
title: Revenge bod! Gemma Oaten shows off stunning bikini body as she celebrates being single
text:
Revenge bod! Gemma Oaten shows off stunning bikini body as she celebrates being single Ex Emmerdale star Gemma is on a well deserved break with her mum and dad Share http://dc3-otxapp-01:8280/MMWSI/MMWSI?action=GetAssetData&user=lucybuckland&service=Drag_To_Application&db=jSuite&r=1490428646943&id=TRMRMMGLPICT000115279511& (Photo: Instagram) Share   Thank you for subscribing!   
She plays a sexy nurse in Holby City but after these saucy holiday snaps fans will be clambering to see soap star Gemma Oaten in much steamier roles. 
In a perfect revenge bod selfie, the star, who revealed she was dumped by Nick Knowles by text message, showed off her super toned frame in a cute two piece. 
Gorgeous Gemma, 31, who is holidaying with her parents, sported a floral triangle navy strapped top and kept her wavy locks looose for the casual bedroom selfie. 
And the Moroccan sun looked to have done its job as the TV star sported a healthy glow as she proudly revealed she was cigarette free on her break. (Photo: Instagram) (Photo: Instagram) 
"What a hol so far, belly still aches from laughing with mum and dad yesterday. Oh...and... Gemma 1 cigarettes NIL. day 4! Thanks for all the support. Means so so much!" 
Her hot bod comes as she revealed thought she had found something special as she began dating Nick last year. 
But her dream was shattered when he dumped her by text. 
The actress dated dad-of-four Nick, 54, briefly in September after meeting at the TV Choice Awards. 
Nick had called her “beautiful” and, after learning she had brought her gay best friend as her date, told Gemma: “Well I’m not gay, I’m single and I’m not an idiot. Let me take you out for dinner.” 
The DIY SOS star swept her off her feet for a romantic weekend in Edinburgh, during which she poured her heart out to him. 
But as they lay in bed he got a text saying pictures of them had emerged. 
Gemma said he turned cold and shortly after “dropped her like a ton of bricks” – before publicly insisting his only priority was rebuilding a relationship with his estranged wife Jessica, 29, the mum of his youngest child Eddie, two. 
Hull-born Gemma watched as Nick and Jess reunited and then split again in January. 
She now insists the whole experience has taught her a valuable lesson and made her stronger. She said: “The experience with Nick knocked my confidence and I’ve learned to keep my guard up since dating him. 
“My friends tell me I always wear my heart on my sleeve and I’m too trusting. 
“Now when I go on dates I don’t reveal as much about myself. From an upsetting ordeal I’ve learned a positive lesson. 
“It was upsetting and hurtful, but it hasn’t put me off men." 
She last saw Nick at January’s National Television Awards at London’s O2 Arena. 
She claims he didn’t even speak to her when he saw her. Like us on Facebook
